file: tmp_【 #アキロゼ5周年Live 】ーHistoric ROUTE ５ー￤3DLIVE【ホロライブ⧸アキ・ローゼンタール】 [hURqBaVxnSg]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Medley intro featuring snippets of Aki Rosenthal's songs in a high-energy remix style.
Cinematic opening scene 'Historic ROUTE 5'. Aki Rosenthal arrives at a desert bar in a vintage red convertible and drives off into the horizon.

subtitles.original: Shall we dance? Shall we dance?
subtitles.english: Shall we dance? Shall we dance?

subtitles.original: 今宵は二人 踊り明かそう
subtitles.english: Tonight, let's dance the night away, the two of us.

subtitles.original: 夢の中へと 誘いましょう
subtitles.english: I'll invite you into a dream.

subtitles.original: Shall we dance? Shall we dance?
subtitles.english: Shall we dance? Shall we dance?

subtitles.original: もっと近くへ おいでよ
恋の魔法を かけましょう
subtitles.english: I'll cast a love spell on you.

subtitles.original: アキロゼ 5周年 記念ライブ
